title: Simulation Game-Based Real-Time Feedback Program for Enhancing Language Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business communication skills and intermediate language proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for manager/leader learners to improve language proficiency through digital simulation games replicating real work environments, practicing strategic decision-making and communication skills via real-time feedback, with an emphasis on small-group collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can perform given language tasks within a simulation game with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can revise and improve communication strategies three or more times using a real-time feedback system.
Learners can propose two or more language leadership strategies applicable to real-world work scenarios through team projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
